title: Chicken shawarma
ingredients: ['For the chicken', '7 tablespoons malt vinegar', '4 tablespoons low fat natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground cardamom', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs', 'For the tahini sauce', '100g (4 oz) tahini', '4 tablespoons low fat natural yoghurt', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'To serve', '4 medium tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1 onion, sliced', '225g (8 oz) iceberg or cos lettuce, shredded', '8 pitta breads']
